titleStmt.title: 31. Martii, 1646. An ordinance of the Lords and Commons assembled in Parliament: to command all Papists, officers, and souldiers of fortune, and such as have borne armes against the Parliament to depart out of the lines of communication before the sixth of Aprill or to bee proceeded against as spies. H. Elsynge Cler. Parl. D. Com.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
